definition: chemical examination/to do a lab test
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Here are the slips for blood test and fluoroscopic examination.

sentences.english: By the time we get the coag studies, it'll be too late.
sentences.chinese: 等拿到化驗單，就太晚了。

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 進勞教所時，抽血化驗查出李的血液中攜帶艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: At that time, I was just a lowly paid analyst.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，我只是一個低收入的化驗員。

sentences.english: Come back again next week for the results and another check of your blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 一週後來複診看化驗結果和複查血壓。

sentences.chinese: 她會給你開一張化驗單。

sentences.english: It will take further testing to find out what kind of animal bones are in the broth.
sentences.chinese: 至於這是一碗什麼動物的湯還要進一步化驗纔會得知。

sentences.english: Police are carrying out an analysis of the dirt on the victim; s botts .
sentences.chinese: 警察在對受害人鞋上的泥土進行化驗分析。

sentences.english: Why every time a few times should my exsanguinate assay smoke what just go out to come?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼每次我抽血化驗都要抽幾次纔出的來呢？

sentences.english: The bananas from the canal are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 從運河中來的香蕉被做了化驗分析。

sentences.english: Figures refer to the number of responding medical laboratory technologists who reported retired or emigrated .
sentences.chinese: 有關數字指填報退休或移民的醫務化驗師人數。

sentences.english: Test results on the child, who is presently hospitalized, are pending.
sentences.chinese: 該男童目前正在住院，尚在等待化驗結果。

sentences.english: It is recommended to analyse the oil sample for existence of metal particles.
sentences.chinese: 如果發現磁堵上存在金屬物質，則推薦取油樣化驗。

sentences.english: The professional technology personnel in the hospital has the lab technician is graduation of technical secondary school only.
sentences.chinese: 醫院裏的專業技術人員只有化驗員是中專畢業的。

sentences.english: Wu Min tested the blood on the sheets and the blood type of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 吳敏化驗出牀單上的血跡和死者的血型一樣。

sentences.english: Therefore melts in the urine test the chorion to press the gonadotrophic hormone to be called the pregnancy test.
sentences.chinese: 因此化驗尿中的絨毛膜促性腺激素稱爲妊娠試驗。

definition: to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
